javadoc: Coordinates cursor location and scrolling between the two sides of a ListingCodeComparisonPanel.

methods.javadoc:
Constructor for this dual listing field panel coordinator.
@param dualListingPanel the dual listing to be controlled by this coordinator.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructor for this dual listing field panel coordinator.

params.name: dualListingPanel
params.comment: the dual listing to be controlled by this coordinator.

methods.javadoc:
Sets a new address correlation for associating addresses between the left and right sides.
 The field panels can then be coordinated by locking the layouts together whenever the
 current location on one side can be correlated with a location on the other side.
@param addressCorrelation the correlation to use for locking the two sides together for
 scrolling.
methods.name: setCorrelation
methods.comment:
Sets a new address correlation for associating addresses between the left and right sides.
 The field panels can then be coordinated by locking the layouts together whenever the
 current location on one side can be correlated with a location on the other side.

params.name: addressCorrelation
params.comment:
the correlation to use for locking the two sides together for
 scrolling.

methods.name: adjustFieldPanel
methods.comment:
Kicks the field panels viewChanged() method so that the field panels will realign their
 layouts using the locked line numbers.

params.name: fp
params.comment: the field panel that has focus.

methods.name: setLockedAddresses
methods.comment:
Sets the left and right addresses that should currently be locked together for
 synchronized scrolling.

params.name: leftAddress
params.comment: the address in the left listing.

params.name: rightAddress
params.comment: the address in the right listing.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the left and right addresses that are currently locked together for synchronized 
 scrolling.
@return an array containing the left (index 0) and right (index 1) addresses that are 
 locked together.
methods.name: getLockedAddresses
methods.comment:
Gets the left and right addresses that are currently locked together for synchronized 
 scrolling.

return.comment:
an array containing the left (index 0) and right (index 1) addresses that are 
 locked together.

name: ListingComparisonFieldPanelCoordinator
comment: Coordinates cursor location and scrolling between the two sides of a ListingCodeComparisonPanel.
